projectGridLines.title: Functionality Development and improvement in Banking Systems
projectGridLines.description:
The project focuses on the below:

  • CRM - To implement complex rules, advanced functionality and integrating with Bank’s system
  • Data & Business Analytics - Understanding Business Performance and facilitating data-driven strategies for growth
  • Vendor Management - To manage vendor payouts, optimizing workflow, and ensuring the process aligns with organizational and compliance standards.
  • Audit System Development – To enable efficient compliance management, provide visibility into risk areas, and support a proactive approach to meeting regulatory requirements.

projectGridLines.title: Data-Driven Decision Making in Talent Management
projectGridLines.description: The project focuses on gathering, analyzing, and interpreting employee data to drive HR strategies related to recruitment, performance, and retention. The intern will work on dashboards, reports, and predictive models to enhance decision-making.

projectGridLines.title: Data Analytics of Vehicle Loans business.
projectGridLines.description:
• Analyze the business model and suggest improvements that need to be made.
  • Analyze gap areas in business sourcing.
  • Opportunity size.
  • Prospective profit opportunities.
  • Profiling of the customer.

projectGridLines.title: Analyzing and Optimizing Digital Sales Funnels
projectGridLines.description:
Focus on analyzing the current digital sales funnels for different products, identifying bottlenecks, and proposing ways to streamline the journey. The intern will use data to track user flows and optimize touchpoints to increase conversion rates.

Skill sets: Data analysis, funnel analysis, visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau), Excel, customer journey mapping.
